description: NIMROD uses a combination of semi-implicit and implicit time-stepping algorithms to advance the equations of extended magnetohydrodynamics. It uses 2D spectral elements and Fourier series for the third periodic direction.
name: NIMROD magnetohydrodynamics code
organization: USDOE Advanced Research Projects Agency – Energy (ARPA-E) (United States) (ARPA-E)
tags: USDOE Advanced Research Projects Agency – Energy (ARPA-E) (United States) (ARPA-E)
